content:
Welcome to the Welsh Society of Western New England! We are a group dedicated to promoting and preserving Welsh culture in the New England region.

Our society hosts a variety of events and activities throughout the year, including Welsh language classes, traditional Welsh music and dance performances, and cultural lectures and workshops. We also celebrate Welsh holidays and traditions, such as St. David's Day and the Eisteddfod, a Welsh festival of literature, music, and performance.

In addition to these events, we also provide a welcoming and supportive community for those interested in Welsh culture. Whether you have Welsh heritage or simply have an interest in the culture, we welcome you to join us and become a part of our vibrant and active society.

So why join the Welsh Society of Western New England? By becoming a member, you will have the opportunity to learn about and experience Welsh culture firsthand, connect with others who share your interests, and be a part of preserving and promoting Welsh heritage in the New England area.

We hope you will consider joining us and becoming a part of our Welsh community. Please visit our website or contact us for more information on upcoming events and how to become a member. Thank you for your interest in the Welsh Society of Western New England!
